_source.text: (1971) dir Mel Stuart w/Gene Wilder, Peter Ostrum, Jack Albertson [100 min] This psychedelic musical about Charlie (Ostrum) and his visit to a mysterious chocolate factory is proof that yes, sometimes the movie is better than the book.
